price: And mention in the Book [the story of] Ishmael. He was true to his promise and was a messenger and a prophet.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi is'māʿīla innahu kāna ṣādiqa al-waʿdi wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
